mapper.update: update board set hit = hit + 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.delete: update board set del = 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board values ( null, #{title} , #{contents} , 0, now(), (select if( isnull(max(group_no)) , 0 , max(group_no)) from board a )+1, 1, 1, #{userNo}, 0)
mapper.select: select count(no) as totalPosts from board;
select count(no) as totalPosts from board where title like concat('%' , #{keyword}, '%') or contents like concat('%' , #{keyword}, '%');

select a.no, a.title, a.contents, a.hit, a.group_no as groupNo, a.order_no as orderNo, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, a.user_no as userNo, a.del, b.name as userName from board a join user b on a.user_no = b.no where a.title like concat('%' , #{keyword}, '%') or a.contents like concat('%' , #{keyword}, '%') order by group_no desc, order_no asc limit #{fromPost}, #{perPageNum}
